title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 34 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 34 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: I will bless the LORD at all times: his praise shall continually be in my mouth.
lineList.cn: 我要时时称颂耶和华。赞美他的话必常在我口中。

lineList.en: My soul shall make her boast in the LORD: the humble shall hear thereof, and be glad.
lineList.cn: 我的心必因耶和华夸耀。谦卑人听见，就要喜乐。

lineList.en: O magnify the LORD with me, and let us exalt his name together.
lineList.cn: 你们和我当称耶和华为大，一同高举他的名。

lineList.en: I sought the LORD, and he heard me, and delivered me from all my fears.
lineList.cn: 我曾寻求耶和华，他就应允我，救我脱离了一切的恐惧。

lineList.en: They looked unto him, and were lightened: and their faces were not ashamed.
lineList.cn: 凡仰望他的，便有光荣。他们的脸，必不蒙羞。

lineList.en: This poor man cried, and the LORD heard him, and saved him out of all his troubles.
lineList.cn: 我这困苦人呼求，耶和华便垂听，救我脱离一切患难。

lineList.en: The angel of the LORD encampeth round about them that fear him, and delivereth them.
lineList.cn: 耶和华的使者，在敬畏他的人四围安营，搭救他们。

lineList.en: O taste and see that the LORD is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.
lineList.cn: 你们要尝尝主恩的滋味，便知道他是美善。投靠他的人有福了。

lineList.en: O fear the LORD, ye his saints: for there is no want to them that fear him.
lineList.cn: 耶和华的圣民哪，你们当敬畏他，因敬畏他的一无所缺。

lineList.en: The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger: but they that seek the LORD shall not want any good thing.
lineList.cn: 少壮狮子，还缺食忍饿。但寻求耶和华的。什么好处都不缺。

lineList.en: Come, ye children, hearken unto me: I will teach you the fear of the LORD.
lineList.cn: 众弟子阿，你们当来听我的话。我要将敬畏耶和华的道教训你们。

lineList.en: What man is he that desireth life, and loveth many days, that he may see good?
lineList.cn: 有何人喜好存活，爱慕长寿，得享美福。

lineList.en: Keep thy tongue from evil, and thy lips from speaking guile.
lineList.cn: 就要禁止舌头不出恶言，嘴唇不说诡诈的话。

lineList.en: Depart from evil, and do good; seek peace, and pursue it.
lineList.cn: 要离恶行善，寻求和睦，一心追赶。

lineList.en: The eyes of the LORD are upon the righteous, and his ears are open unto their cry.
lineList.cn: 耶和华的眼目，看顾义人，他的耳朵，听他们的呼求。

lineList.en: The face of the LORD is against them that do evil, to cut off the remembrance of them from the earth.
lineList.cn: 耶和华向行恶的人变脸，要从世上除灭他们的名号。

lineList.en: The righteous cry, and the LORD heareth, and delivereth them out of all their troubles.
lineList.cn: 义人呼求，耶和华听见了，便救他们脱离一切患难。

lineList.en: The LORD is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.
lineList.cn: 耶和华靠近伤心的人，拯救灵性痛悔的人。

lineList.en: Many are the afflictions of the righteous: but the LORD delivereth him out of them all.
lineList.cn: 义人多有苦难。但耶和华救他脱离这一切。

lineList.en: He keepeth all his bones: not one of them is broken.
lineList.cn: 又要保全他一身的骨头，连一根也不折断。

lineList.en: Evil shall slay the wicked: and they that hate the righteous shall be desolate.
lineList.cn: 恶必害死恶人。恨恶义人的，必被定罪。

lineList.en: The LORD redeemeth the soul of his servants: and none of them that trust in him shall be desolate.
lineList.cn: 耶和华救赎他仆人的灵魂。凡投靠他的，必不至定罪。
